page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: The area covered by our block has a very poor telecommunications network for public use. Within the block there are only{three telephone kiosks. There is also a large problem with {vandalism.}Often none of the three kiosks are in working order. Whithin the block there are two {Post {Offices}both in the village of Brynamman. The area has only one morning postal delivery with collections limited to three per day. {Public opinion}on these facilities is that there is room for improvement with more kiosk and a more frequent delivery service.
